rundown.headline: Punjab Police gun down ISI-linked suspects in Ludhiana encounter; grenades, pistols recovered
rundown.summary: Punjab Police fatally shot suspects linked to ISI in a Ludhiana encounter, recovering grenades and pistols from the scene.

rundown.headline: Japan OKs $135 billion stimulus package to help revive its sluggish economy
rundown.summary: Japan has approved a $135 billion stimulus package aimed at revitalizing its sluggish economy and promoting growth.

rundown.headline: Why Are Citi and Morgan Stanley Turning Strongly Positive on M&M?
rundown.summary: Citi and Morgan Stanley have upgraded their outlook on M&M, indicating a strong positive sentiment towards the company's future performance.

rundown.headline: Procter & Gamble (PG) Dividend Stock Analysis
rundown.summary: The analysis focuses on Procter & Gamble as a dividend stock, highlighting its attractive dividend yield, strong financials, and consistent dividend growth, making it a favorable investment option for income-focused investors.

rundown.headline: Trump drops 40% tariffs on Brazilian beef, coffee amid rising food prices
rundown.summary: Trump has removed 40% tariffs on Brazilian beef and coffee to address rising food prices, signaling a shift in trade policy aimed at easing consumer costs.

rundown.headline: Ibotta Stock: A Non-Rewarding Experience (NYSE:IBTA)
rundown.summary: The article discusses the disappointing performance of Ibotta's stock (NYSE: IBTA), highlighting it as a non-rewarding investment experience.
